name: places/ChIJWWBCDqxZwokRUxQj222lJ1I
formattedAddress: 144 W 37th St #5A, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 144 W 37th St #5A, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text:
I had my first SMP session at Gerow Ink with Jonathan Gerow and it exceeded all my expectations. He’s very professional & genuine. He educated me throughly on the procedure, expectations, aftercare, and answered all questions/concerns that I had during the initial consultation. He’s very meticulous with his work and careful to create natural looking results for clientele.

The facility is very clean/well organized. The staff at the front desk are all courteous and professional. Also, prices are fair/reasonable without any pressure for sales. I highly recommend Gerow Ink and their team for SMP services.

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of working with Eric, and I cannot express how delighted I am with the results. From the moment I walked into the studio, Eric's friendly and personable manner immediately put me at ease. His professionalism and expertise shone through every step of the process, making it a truly positive experience.

Eric's attention to detail and commitment to achieving the best possible results are commendable. He took the time to understand my preferences and concerns, ensuring that the final outcome exceeded my expectations. Throughout the sessions, Eric explained each step and addressed any questions or concerns I had. This transparency and commitment to my satisfaction reinforced my trust in him as a skilled practitioner.

If you're considering SMP and want a professional, friendly, and highly skilled person, look no further than Eric. I wholeheartedly recommend his services and am grateful for the fantastic experience he provided. Thank you, Eric!

originalText.text: Jonathan Gerow is a true artist. I had a unique case where I wanted it to look good both with my hair buzzed and with it grown out to my usual style. He fine tuned it over the course of the sessions and took his time. His attention to detail is impeccable and I'd recommend him to anyone, especially if they're looking for an undetectable, natural smp job that ages well.

originalText.text: Jonathan has always been the GOAT in this industry. I met Jonathan over 8 yrs ago and I just wanna shout out Gregg who did my original smp. I did my "touch up" after so long with Jonathan... let it be know a touch up to Jonathan is like make something old brand new again. I am very happy and blessed to have him still in the Game. The staff is excellent and it definitely shows that the reflection of the type of person Jonathan is. Much respect and love.

originalText.text:
This was one of my best experiences on my PMU journey!!!
The studio is immaculate, welcoming and very clean. The receptionist very friendly and respectful. I love the fact that they are well organized, professional and knowledgeable.
The system they've developed is simple & efficient and very easy to understand. I also liked the fact that we had the opportunity to study online prior class commencement.
I loved the "group" experience as well as the personal attention, all my concerns were addressed in a supportive and nurturing manner.
I would highly recommend that if you're interested in getting into this industry...Gerow is the place to grow! (no pun intended).
I learned so much and feel confident to do my first client after this amazing master class.
Chris, Erik, Johnathan & Aleetha are an amazing team and great example of how to win it!!!!
A++++++
